snippet: Mitt Romney’s transition team has been working since June, offering a glimpse into what his approach to governing might be.
abstract: Mitt Romney’s transition team is busy putting together a framework should he win the White House, offering a glimpse into what his approach to governing might be.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney’s transition team has been working since June, offering a glimpse into what his approach to governing might be.

headline.seo: Mitt Romney’s Transition Team Is Hard at Work
headline.main: Campaigning Aside, Team Plans a Romney Presidency
headline.print_headline: Campaigning Aside, Team Plans a Romney Presidency
